test_code_analysis: The tests verify the functionality of the login endpoint, covering successful login, invalid credentials, missing username or password, service exceptions, and invalid JSON scenarios.

The tests cover various scenarios for the login functionality of the account lock controller, including successful login, invalid login credentials, missing required fields, invalid JSON data, and unexpected exceptions.
The tests verify the login functionality of the account lockout controller, covering scenarios of successful login, account lockout, invalid credentials, missing data, and non-JSON data.
